description: TraceHub coordinates correlated tracing across the Temporal Loom with governed audit storage and export controls.

last_health_check.notes: Session pipeline and export toggles validated against tracehub_status 1.0.0 with process_logs mediation.

notes: TraceHub no longer persists audit buffers under /memory; logs are staged in /mnt/tracehub until exported.
Use process_logs.append and process_logs.export for any downstream delivery.

prerequisites: Obtain TVA + Sentinel approval for persistent retention
procedure: 1) Flush session buffers into /mnt/tracehub as JSONL via tracehub_status wrapper.
2) Call process_logs.append for each buffered record to register with the process_logs pipeline.
3) Use process_logs.export to bundle approved entries and attach TVA seal metadata (ledger id, approver, timestamp).
4) Release TraceHub writers after confirming export completion and TVA ledger updates.
manual_export.notes: Exports are mediated through process_logs; no persistent audit directories remain inside TraceHub.

notes: Externalized status reporting to tracehub_status wrapper with temporary /mnt staging and process_logs exports.
